page.title: 03Road Names
page.content: Many of the roads in the area are named after prominent industrialists. { Myvod}Road is named after the parish of{Meifod}in Wales, birthplace of the Lloyds (of FH Lloyd),{Barlow}Road is named after an industrialist who was mayor of Wednesbury (1929-31),{Mills } {and Bills}Streets(Darlaston) are named after the 1st iron furnace partnership of Darlaston Green in{1806,}the original site is now almost totally cleared.{Beebee Road}after an industrialist and prominent local politician (Mayor 1921-24).{Wood Green was once a seperate hamlet in{Cannock} {Chase}forest.{Prince George}Road was named after the visit of the Duke of York to open the 2000th council house after a large programme of slum clearance.{Dingley}Road after a noted 19C doctor who had three beautiful daughters; one married Epstein.
